mdRecord.dcterms:title: Application for War Ration Book No. 4
mdRecord.dcterms:description: A postcard sized Application for War Rations filled out by Mrs. Maude L. Howard, Floyd Virginia. The application is postmarked June 7th 1943, and bears a postage stamp of an eagle holding a flag that says "Win the War.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: War bonds & funds
War compensations
War relief
World War II
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
